comments:
Hello

I am a bloody beginner with installations. I had eclipse 2.1 and i downloaded 
eclipse 3.0 and i unzipped the newer version over the 2.1. After this action
eclipse cant be started again. 

Please help - of course i have very urgent work to do and ....
Best regards Munot
